How to create a random password and assign to a user

  1. Store the username in a variable
    export user_name="x1kxk630"
  2. Set random password in a variable
    export pass_word=$(perl -le 'print map { (a..z,A..Z,0..9,qw{- _ / & ?})[rand 67] } 0..10')
  3. Encrypt it
    export pass_word_crypt=$(
